AWAITING_RESPONSE.TITLE: Awaiting participant response
AWAITING_RESPONSE.MSG: This participant is yet to answer the training. When they do, you'll be able to see the results here.

NAME: Name

ALERT.MESSAGE: The training has been deleted along with all its' responses.
ALERT.TITLE: Training Deleted

ERROR.MESSAGE: An error ocurred while deleting the training, please try again later.
ERROR.TITLE: Error deleting training

CONFIRMATION.TITLE: Delete Training
CONFIRMATION.HELPER: You are about to delete the {{trainingName}} training. This cannot be undone. All responses and associated data will be lost and will not be recoverable and all links sent to complete the training will be rendered useless.

EDIT_TRAINING.TITLE: Edit Training
EDIT_TRAINING.SUBTITLE: To avoid unreliable results for trainings, you can only modify the name of the training once it's created. If you wish to change the type or difficulty of the training your team does, you must create a new one.

NAME.LABEL: Training Name
NAME.HELPER: Enter a name that will differentiate this training from others you have or will create in the future.

PRESET.LABEL: Training type
PRESET.HELPER: The training type allows you to select from a variety of training scenarios for your team.

LEVEL.LABEL: Training level
LEVEL.HELPER: The level of the training determines both the scenario complexity and the number of questions.

EMAIL.SINGLE_DESCRIPTION: Enter the emails of the people you want to enroll into this training below. Each person will receive an email with a link that will allow them to take the training.
EMAIL.LABEL: Assignees
EMAIL.HELPER: Add assignee emails and we'll take care of the rest
EMAIL.ERROR: There was an error validating the email address

CONFIRMATION.TITLE: Confirmation
CONFIRMATION.MSG: Please confirm the details are correct

CREATE_TRAINING.SUBTITLE: Configure the following parameters and Batuta will create a tailor-made training for each of participant.

ASSIGNMENT.SUBTITLE: Training Assignment
ASSIGNMENT.MSG: Enter the emails of the people you want to enroll into this training below. Each person will receive an email with a link that will allow them to take the training.

ALERT.MESSAGE: The training was successfully created and the assigned users have received an email with further instructions
ALERT.TITLE: Training Created

CREATE_TRAINING.TITLE: Create New Training

beginner_HELPER: Five minute training around basic concepts most of which are multiple-choice
intermediate_HELPER: 10 minute training that requires a moderate knowledge level
expert_HELPER: 30 minute training with complex open-ended questions
